mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM_INFO A
JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.ITEM_NO , A.ITEM_NAME , D.CATEGORY_NAME , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.ITEM_STANDARD , A.ITEM_MAKE , A.ITEM_SALES , E.STORE_AMOUNT , A.ITEM_SOLDOUT_YN , F.FILE_NO , F.ORIGIN_NAME , F.FILE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ITEM_NO , B.ITEM_NAME , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.ITEM_STANDARD , B.ITEM_MAKE , B.ITEM_SALES , B.ITEM_SOLDOUT_YN FROM (SELECT C.ITEM_NO , C.ITEM_NAME , C.CATEGORY_NO , C.ITEM_STANDARD , C.ITEM_MAKE , C.ITEM_SALES , C.ITEM_SOLDOUT_YN FROM ITEM_INFO C
JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY D ON(C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO)
D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY C.ITEM_NO ASC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY D ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN STO_ITEM_INFO E ON (A.ITEM_NO = E.ITEM_NO) LEFT JOIN ITEM_FILE F ON (A.ITEM_NO = F.ITEM_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY A.ITEM_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INTEREST ( INTER_NO , STORE_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , ITEM_NO ) SELECT SEQ_INTEREST_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ storeName } , A.CATEGORY_NO , #{ itemNo } FROM ITEM_INFO A WHERE ITEM_NO = ${ itemNo }
